title: Tellek Garing
author: Tellek Garing
content: One of the core values of the Ethereume blockchain is to provide an alternative to the scalability problems faced in the Bitcoin network and also to provide an alternative root to actualizing that.But in recent time there have been some shortcoming from various projects who walk away with investors' fund and abounding the project, but taking into account some new development that has performed well in both NFTs and the matter verse bringing into virtual reality making the proof of stake chain advantage to the environment and so much of what have you. What future can we see from the alternative cryptocurrency industry?

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: Tellek Garing on June 08, 2022, 05:08:40 PMOne of the core values of the Ethereume blockchain is to provide an alternative to the scalability problems faced in the Bitcoin network and also to provide an alternative root to actualizing that.Ethereum fails to expand its scalability. Ethereum 2.0 has been delayed a few years. However the value of Ethereum is its environment for other projects to build on ERC-20 chain.It is the first blockchain allows other projects to do so. Binance Smart Chain and other chains are followers of Ethereum ERC20. It is a pioneer in blockchain industry, Bitcoin is the first, Ethereum is the second.QuoteBut in recent time there have been some shortcoming from various projects who walk away with investors' fund and abounding the project, but taking into account some new development that has performed well in both NFTs and the matter verse bringing into virtual reality making the proof of stake chain advantage to the environment and so much of what have you. What future can we see from the alternative cryptocurrency industry?NFT projects are only very parts of Ethereum ecosystem and of crypto ecosystem. They are not only part to contribute to success of Ethereum ecosystem. I don't think it is fair to say ERC20 is a chain for scam projects. You can find scam projects, scammers anywhere, from real estate, stock to crypto markets. Scammers often find where they can deploy their scam projects and steal money from naive victims.Ethereum can not protect all investors in crypto market from scammers. Investors are responsible for their money and what projects they invest in. Even in scam projects, you can be a winner if you have good entry and exit price. Even in good projects, you can be a loser if you have bad entry and exit price.

comments.body: Quote from: Tellek Garing on June 08, 2022, 05:08:40 PMWhat future can we see from the alternative cryptocurrency industry?IMHO, there will be a big purge for the altcoins market. You see that ICOs have failed because of the scammers that it had made it as their den and the same goes for metaverse and NFTs. It had became the place of scammers although there really are those legitimate projects that have been serious with their development. And once that purge happens, it will be the top altcoins shall remain but bitcoin will still be the king at the top of this entirety.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: DeFi and NFT have not done anything new, just repackaged the same shitcoin into a new gift box and offered to the investors. Those who think otherwise are making a fool of themselves. Truly some handful of projects may actually do good but these are very few and most often only a dream. Hence the future of altcoins remains the same - pump and dump while the creators make money and the investors keep losing money with every gamble of an investment.The same drama happened all the way from ICO to NFT, clearly nothing has changed with the scammers running them nor the investors getting scammed.

comments.author: $anounimus$
comments.body: As you can see, alternative cryptocurrencies are more prevalent than ever. They serve many different purposes, so it shouldn't be surprising that they have attracted a wide variety of investors and users. And while alternative currencies have yet to go mainstream, they will likely continue gaining traction as time goes on. We'll see many exciting developments in the coming year as more and more projects focus on established and tested blockchains instead of building on untested code. There is still a lot we can learn from these new platforms, and I believe there will be a lot of great new alternative cryptocurrencies to watch out for in 2022.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: I guess the future is already here, altcoin market is going to be a pump and dump market. Only those that are prime movers and have a solid use case could survived the market.As for ETH, it has evolved as well, just like it's counterpart, BTC. Although is supposed to be an alternative, now it's moving away as it is being developed to cater what the current market situations needs. So it's going to be cyclical, ICO->NFT->Defi->Staking and what's not.
